Package src.ActionCapables

Class User

java.lang.Object
src.ActionCapables.User
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionCapable
public class User extends Object implements ActionCapable
This is a User class that represents a user with a balance, a list of bookings, and a status indicating if the user is done. It implements the ActionCapable interface.
